name: Zombie Maze - Can you escape from the zombies ?
name_original: Zombie Maze - Can you escape from the zombies ?
description:
Find your way all the time in the maze, have fun in this game retro style with 3D graphics.

Levels are unlimited since they are generated at the time or shared by other players.

You will find different levels of difficulty that will make these pure fun.

* FEATURES *

- Unlimited Mazes
- Zombie Land Mode Game
- Cross platform multiplayer
- 30 characters
- 7 world
- 3D graphics

Escape before the zombies catch you

Download and enjoy !!
